description:
This is a market on whether New World will be in the Top 5 games on Steam in terms of current players on October 12, 2021 at 12:00PM ET. In the case of ties, the market will use standard competition ranking ("1224" ranking),  where each game's ranking number is 1 plus the number of games ranked above it. If New World is in the top 5 or tied for the fifth spot, the market will resolve "Yes", and otherwise "No." 

Results of this market will be decided by official Steam player counts available at https://store.steampowered.com/stats/. In the event the resolution source is not available on October 12, 2021 at 12:00PM ET, another credible source will be chosen, and if no other credible sources are available, the sources will be checked every 24 hours until November 12, 2021 when the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Will New World be a Top 5 game on Steam two weeks after release?
